name: Caramel-y Date Sundae

instructions.action: Combine chopped Kalmi dates and water in a small saucepan
Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until dates soften and begin to break down (about 5-7 minutes)
Mash dates with a fork or blend until smooth and caramel-like
Add vanilla extract and heavy cream if using, stir well
Remove from heat and let cool slightly (sauce will thicken as it cools)
Scoop ice cream into serving bowls
Drizzle warm date caramel sauce over ice cream
Top with chopped nuts and serve immediately

tips: Date caramel sauce can be made ahead and reheated
Add a pinch of sea salt for salted caramel version
Store leftover sauce in refrigerator for up to 1 week
Use on pancakes, waffles, or yogurt as well
For thinner sauce, add more water; for thicker, cook longer
